task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 1°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will tilt my camera up to see the roof.

I can now see the top and bottom of the building; by counting the approximately 16 floors and estimating each floor is about 3 meters high, plus a slightly taller ground floor, I can estimate the total height to be around 50 meters.
